alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Park Valley to 30 miles north of Utah Test and Training Range North to Wendover. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Snowville, Park Valley, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Locomotive Springs, Promontory, Lakeside, Curlew Junction, Rosette, Gunnison Island and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 25. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 20 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
